briefdescription.para: Debug/testing mode, items are drawn as solid rectangles.
Render items as outlines only.
Use antialiasing when drawing items.
Enable advanced effects such as blend modes.
Force output in vector format where possible, even if items require rasterization to keep their correct appearance.
Hide coverage layer in outputs.
Draw selection.
Flags for controlling how a layout is rendered.
Constructor for QgsLayoutRenderContext.
Returns true if the item bounding boxes should be drawn.
Returns the current item layer to draw while exporting.

detaileddescription.para: QgsLayoutItem subclasses which support multi-layer SVG exports must check this and customize their rendering based on the layer.
If layer is -1, all item layers should be rendered.

briefdescription.para: Returns the dpi for outputting the layout.
Returns the current combination of flags used for rendering the layout.
Returns true if the page grid should be drawn.
Returns true if the render current being conducted is a preview render, i.e.

detaileddescription.para: it is being rendered inside a QGraphicsView widget as opposed to a destination device (such as an image).

briefdescription.para: Returns the layout measurement converter to be used in the layout.

detaileddescription.para: This converter is used for translating between other measurement units and the layout's native unit.

briefdescription.para: Returns the layout measurement converter to be used in the layout.

detaileddescription.para: This converter is used for translating between other measurement units and the layout's native unit.

briefdescription.para: Returns whether the page items are be visible in the layout.

detaileddescription.para:
This setting effects both display of the page boundaries in layout views and whether they will be rendered in layout exports.
setPagesVisible()

briefdescription.para: Returns the combination of render context flags matched to the layout context's settings.
Gets color that is used for drawing of selected vector features.
Sets whether the item bounding boxes should be visible.
Sets the current item layer to draw while exporting.

detaileddescription.para: QgsLayoutItem subclasses which support multi-layer SVG exports must check the currentExportLayer() and customize their rendering based on the layer.
If layer is -1, all item layers will be rendered.

briefdescription.para: Sets the dpi for outputting the layout.

detaileddescription.para:
This also sets the corresponding DPI for the context's measurementConverter().
dpi()

briefdescription.para: Enables or disables a particular rendering flag for the layout.

detaileddescription.para:
Other existing flags are not affected.
setFlags()
flags()
testFlag()

briefdescription.para: Sets the combination of flags that will be used for rendering the layout.
Sets whether the page grid should be visible.
Sets whether the page items should be visible in the layout.

detaileddescription.para:
Removing them will prevent both display of the page boundaries in layout views and will also prevent them from being rendered in layout exports.
pagesVisible()

briefdescription.para: Sets color that is used for drawing of selected vector features.
Sets the text render format, which dictates how text is rendered (e.g.

detaileddescription.para: as paths or real text objects).

briefdescription.para: Check whether a particular rendering flag is enabled for the layout.
Returns the text render format, which dictates how text is rendered (e.g.

detaileddescription.para: as paths or real text objects).

briefdescription.para: Emitted when the context's DPI is changed.
Emitted whenever the context's flags change.
Stores information relating to the current rendering settings for a layout.
